# HUD::SET_MP_GAMER_TAG_VISIBILITY

## Summary
Switches on/off parts of a players head tag

## Parameters
* **INT** playerNum
* **eMP_TAG** tag
* **BOOL** visible
* **BOOL** evenInCars = false

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
enum eMpGamerTagComponent
{
	MP_TAG_GAMER_NAME,
	MP_TAG_CREW_TAG,
	MP_TAG_HEALTH_ARMOUR,
	MP_TAG_BIG_TEXT,
	MP_TAG_AUDIO_ICON,
	MP_TAG_USING_MENU,
	MP_TAG_PASSIVE_MODE,
	MP_TAG_WANTED_STARS,
	MP_TAG_DRIVER,
	MP_TAG_CO_DRIVER,
	MP_TAG_TAGGED,
	MP_TAG_GAMER_NAME_NEARBY,
	MP_TAG_ARROW,
	MP_TAG_PACKAGES,
	MP_TAG_INV_IF_PED_FOLLOWING,
	MP_TAG_RANK_TEXT,
	MP_TAG_TYPING,
	MP_TAG_BAG_LARGE,
	MP_TAG_ARROW,
	MP_TAG_GANG_CEO,
	MP_TAG_GANG_BIKER,
	MP_TAG_BIKER_ARROW,
	MP_TAG_MC_ROLE_PRESIDENT,
	MP_TAG_MC_ROLE_VICE_PRESIDENT,
	MP_TAG_MC_ROLE_ROAD_CAPTAIN,
	MP_TAG_MC_ROLE_SARGEANT,
	MP_TAG_MC_ROLE_ENFORCER,
	MP_TAG_MC_ROLE_PROSPECT,
	MP_TAG_TRANSMITTER,
	MP_TAG_BOMB
};
